entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone that Harry and his friends are suspicious of.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who trusts Snape.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is stubbornly skeptical of Snape.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as repeating Dumbledore's trust in Snape.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has little time to spare on conversations with Cho.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is mentioned as someone Harry had agreed to visit the village together.

entities.name: the order
entities.description: The Order is mentioned as an organization that Snape works for.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are mentioned as a group that Snape used to be a part of.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: Hogsmeade is mentioned as a village that Harry and his friends visit.

entities.name: valentine's day
entities.description: Valentine's Day is mentioned as a holiday that Harry will spend with Cho.

entities.name: da meetings
entities.description: D.A. meetings are mentioned as secret meetings that Harry and his friends attend.

relationships.description: Hermione repeats Dumbledore's trust in Snape.
